docs.title: FreeSurfer
docs.description:
FreeSurfer is a software package for the analysis and visualization of neuroimaging data from cross-sectional and longitudinal studies. It is developed by the Laboratory for Computational Neuroimaging at the Martinos Center for Biomedical Imaging.

FreeSurfer provides full processing streams for structural and functional MRI and includes tools for linear and nonlinear registration, cortical and subcortical segmentation, cortical surface reconstruction, statistical analysis of group morphometry, diffusion MRI, PET analysis, and much more. It is also the structural MRI analysis software of choice for the Human Connectome Project.

docs.title: mri_concat
docs.description: Concatenates input data sets.

docs.title: Input files
docs.description: Input image files (e.g. file1.mgh file2.mgh ...).

docs.title: Output file
docs.description: Output file name (e.g. output.mgh).

docs.title: File list
docs.description: List file containing a text list of files to process (up to 400000 files).

docs.title: Paired sum
docs.description: Compute paired sum (1+2, 3+4, etc).

docs.title: Paired average
docs.description: Compute paired average (1+2, 3+4, etc).

docs.title: Paired difference
docs.description: Compute paired difference (1-2, 3-4, etc).

docs.title: Paired difference norm
docs.description: Compute paired difference normalized by TP1,2 average.

docs.title: Paired difference norm1
docs.description: Compute paired difference normalized by TP1.

docs.title: Paired difference norm2
docs.description: Compute paired difference normalized by TP2.

docs.title: Normalize mean
docs.description: Normalize frames by mean of all time points.

docs.title: Normalize TP1
docs.description: Normalize frames by first time point (TP1).

docs.title: Matrix file
docs.description: Multiply by matrix from ASCII file.

docs.title: Frame weight file
docs.description: Weight each frame by values in ASCII file (one value per frame).

docs.title: Normalized weighting
docs.description: Normalize frames to sum to 1 after weighting.

docs.title: Group mean
docs.description: Create matrix to average Ng groups, Nper=Ntot/Ng.

docs.title: Combine frames
docs.description: Average frames from non-zero voxels.

docs.title: Keep datatype
docs.description: Write output in the same datatype as input (default is Float format).

docs.title: Take absolute value
docs.description: Take absolute value of input.

docs.title: Set negatives to zero
docs.description: Set input negatives to 0.

docs.title: Set positives to zero
docs.description: Set input positives to 0.

docs.title: Mean
docs.description: Compute mean of concatenated volumes.

docs.title: Median
docs.description: Compute median of concatenated volumes.

docs.title: Mean divided by N
docs.description: Compute mean divided by number of frames.

docs.title: Sum
docs.description: Compute sum of concatenated volumes.

docs.title: Variance
docs.description: Compute variance of concatenated volumes.

docs.title: Standard deviation
docs.description: Compute standard deviation of concatenated volumes.

docs.title: Maximum
docs.description: Compute maximum of concatenated volumes.

docs.title: Maximum index
docs.description: Compute index of maximum of concatenated volumes.

docs.title: Max index prune
docs.description: Set max index to 0 where all frames are 0.

docs.title: Max index add value
docs.description: Add value to non-zero max indices.

docs.title: Minimum
docs.description: Compute minimum of concatenated volumes.

docs.title: Replicate frames
docs.description: Replicate N times over frames.

docs.title: Functional normalization
docs.description: Normalize time series at each voxel.

docs.title: Conjunction
docs.description: Compute voxel-wise conjunction of concatenated volumes.

docs.title: Voting mechanism
docs.description: Most frequent value at each voxel and fraction of occurrences.

docs.title: Sort voxel values
docs.description: Sort each voxel by ascending frame value.

docs.title: Temporal AR1
docs.description: Compute temporal AR1 with degree of freedom adjustment.

docs.title: Prune non-zero values
docs.description: Set voxel value to 0 unless all frames are non-zero.

docs.title: Principal component analysis
docs.description: Compute and output principal component analysis (PCA).

docs.title: PCA mask
docs.description: Mask used to select voxels for PCA (mask > 0.5).

docs.title: Spatial covariance matrix
docs.description: Compute spatial covariance matrix.

docs.title: Z concatenation
docs.description: Concatenate in slice direction skipping nskip slices.

docs.title: Max Bonferroni correction
docs.description: Compute maximum and Bonferroni correct.

docs.title: Multiply value
docs.description: Multiply volumes by value.

docs.title: Add value
docs.description: Add value to volumes.

docs.title: Mask file
docs.description: Mask file used with vote or sort.

docs.title: Root mean square
docs.description: Compute root mean square of concatenated volumes.

docs.title: No input check
docs.description: Do not check inputs.

docs.title: mri_concat
docs.description: Concatenates input data sets.
